section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: In text rendering, list item children of ordered list SHOULD be rendered as a typographical ordered list. Audio and other rendering formats MAY embellish the children of ordered list to signal that the list items do have an inherent order.
Processors SHOULD consider the nesting level of the ordered list component in choosing the indentation level and list item label that is applied to list item children.
